Package com.jidesoft.chart.fit

Contains classes to support interpolation of chart models, either for aesthetics or for better approximations of functions.

          Description

Interface Summary
CurveFitter Changed interface to use lists of points.
 

Class Summary
FunctionMap  
LineFitter Uses Ordinary Least Squares regression to fit a line to a dataset
Polynomial TODO: Could add a special treatment for other powers of x, like square roots

Package com.jidesoft.chart.fit Description

Contains classes to support interpolation of chart models, either for aesthetics or for better approximations of functions.
